properties.name: jwt.token.secret
properties.description: Secret key for signing JWT access and refresh tokens.

properties.name: jwt.token.expiration
properties.description: JWT access token expiration in milliseconds.

properties.name: jwt.token.refresh.expiration
properties.description: JWT refresh token expiration in milliseconds.

properties.name: cache.expiry.ms
properties.description: Cache expiry in milliseconds. If not set, fallback to jwt.token.expiration.

properties.name: cache.expiry.unit
properties.description: Cache expiry time unit (e.g. minutes, seconds).

properties.name: cache.expiry.min
properties.description: Minimum cache expiry value in the chosen unit.

properties.name: cache.maxsize
properties.description: Maximum cache size for Caffeine cache.

properties.name: cache.tokens.name
properties.description: A description for Cache Token name
